name: Knight Archer and the Journey Against The Dark Night
name_original: Knight Archer and the Journey Against The Dark Night
description:
A beautiful environmental world where everything is green and peaceful. Until the day a villanous general decides to invoke a powerful demon, and obtain its powers to dominate over the Earth.

An innocent damsel in distress turned to stone by its cruel powers, as half of the people in the village.

And a young boy armed with a sword and bow and arrows to fight the monsters, do imaginative puzzles and fight powerful bosses.

Exploit the Dark Night Forest, the Air Twer, the Pyramid of the Scared Oasis, the Ice Palace in the Snow Plains, and the Underground Volcano of this mystic world.

Explore a huge world filled with different environments, and find the seven colorful magic gems that will allow you to defeat the ultimate boss: the Shadow God.

Solve intriguing plaform puzzle levels where all care is needed, and prove your skills in an intriguing platform game, and help the knight in his quest to obtain a happy ending.

Note for the players:

Thanks you for choosing this game. It was a two-years funny project that I'm glad to have done. Also note that that are many things that I'm not the original creator / animator. Props to any people also. Thank you and have funny games! :)
